# Pull Request Review Checklist

> For small changes or fixes that do not require a formal inspection.
> Larger or high-risk changes should be formally reviewed.

---

## Summary of Change

---

## Type of Change
(Check all that apply)
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Small feature / enhancement
- [ ] Refactor (no behavior change)
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Test-related
- [ ] Other:

---

## Review Checklist

### Correctness
- [ ] Change behaves as described
- [ ] No obvious logic errors
- [ ] Edge cases considered

### Tests
- [ ] Existing tests updated (if applicable)
- [ ] New tests added (if applicable)
- [ ] Tests pass locally / in CI

### Impact & Risk
- [ ] Change is low risk
- [ ] Does not affect core data integrity
- [ ] Does not impact sync/query behavior unexpectedly

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code is readable and well-structured
- [ ] Naming is clear and consistent
- [ ] No unnecessary complexity introduced

### Documentation
- [ ] Comments updated where needed
- [ ] Docs/README updated (if applicable)

---

## Reviewer Notes
Optional comments, questions, or follow-ups.

---

## Approval
- [ ] Approved
- [ ] Approved with minor comments
- [ ] Changes requested

**Date:**
